module.name: product_identification
module.purpose: The Product identification application module supports the requirement to represent products.

inscope.li: representation of the data that identify a product;

definition.def: A document is a form of information which is controlled and communicated as one single unit. A document may be a physically bound book, collection of pages or may exist only in electronic form as one or more files on some electronic medium. More generally a document is a product of the documentation process and records information about some subject.
The characteristic actions, operations, or kind of work a person or thing is supposed to perform; e.g., the engineering function or the material-handling function.

A part is an item that is intended to be produced or employed in a production process. The item refers not only to the finished part but also to any physical constituent or in-process configuration that makes up the finished part. Part can also describe stock material where more than bill-of-material reference information is required.
A crude or processed material that can be converted by manufacture, processing, or combination with other raw materials and products into a new and useful product or raw material.
A requirement is a statement identifying a capability, physical characteristic or quality factor that bounds a product or process need for which a solution will be pursued.

uof.name: Product_Identification
uof.description: The Product_Identification UoF specifies the data types needed to represent the data that identify a product.
